about_the_game:
Bless Online: Puppy Love Pack is an exclusive package put together to commemorate Valentines Day. It includes a cute costume and various items that promote in-game growth.

Bless Online: The Puppy Love Pack can only be downloaded once per account. As all components are character bound, please collect the DLC only with the character you wish to use it with.

Bless Online: Puppy Love Pack Includes the following:

  • Exclusive Costume (Happy Friends Set)
    Transform yourself into a lively and lovably character with this skin!

  • Exclusive Weapon Skin (Crunchy Gift Box)
    Commemorate Valentine’s Day by transforming your weapon into sweet candy with this skin!

  • Lumena (3,600+200)
    Receive 3,800 Lumena that can be used in the game’s Special Currency Shop. Don’t forget to visit the Lumena Shop!

  • Ruru Brother's Magic Pocket (x 10)
    Gather resources easily with the Ruru Brother's Magic Pocket!

  • Popochita Rare Mount Anima (x 10)
    Discover more new companions with the Popochita Rare Mount Anima!

  • Popochita Rare Pet Anima (x 10)
    Discover more new companions with the Popochita Rare Pet Anima!

To activate purchased DLC products in-game, please follow the steps below.
  • Purchase the DLC product.
  • Log on to Bless and open your account inbox.
  • The DLC items will be automatically sent to your character’s mailbox.
    Once you collect the items from your mailbox, the item will automatically be added to the inventory of the character you used to accept the item.

Note:
- The items will be sent individually to the account inbox. Please collect each item with the correct character.
Please note that once the item has been sent to the character’s inventory, it cannot be transferred to another character.
- When redeeming weapon sets, the character that uses the set will receive a weapon skin that matches their character’s class.
- Lumena items are bound to the character. Please redeem the Lumena items from your account inbox using the character you wish to use them on.
(However, Lumena can be transferred between characters in the same account through the Lumena Transfer System)
- Please note the headpiece for the Happy Friends Set does not display normally when worn by female elf/human/mascu characters with an Afro hair style.
